model_answer: The correct answer(s) are B and C. Events 2 and 10 both directly contribute to the career outcome mentioned. Event 2 mentions Dua Lipa's first song and Grammy awards, indicating a successful start to her career. Event 10 establishes her professional artist identity by stating her origin and profession.

The events that most plausibly built up to and prompted Dua Lipa's explicit pronunciation of her name were likely (B) and (C). In event 1, she already discussed her name being Albanian and sounded weird to some people, which hinted at the possibility of pronunciation issues. Later in event 3, when she explained how to pronounce her name, it made sense in the context of addressing those who may have struggled with it previously.
